title: The Mysterious Glow of the Marfa Lights
text: In Texas, strange glowing orbs have been seen floating near the town of Marfa for over a century. Scientists have theories, but the lights still remain unexplained.

title: Japan’s Snow Festival in Sapporo
text: Every year, Sapporo hosts a massive snow and ice sculpture festival that attracts millions of visitors from all over the world.

title: The Hidden Salt Cathedral of Zipaquirá
text: Built deep inside a salt mine in Colombia, this cathedral is carved entirely out of salt rock and is a stunning example of underground architecture.
